mapper.insert: insert into msg(recruit_board_id, member_id, content) values(#{recruitBoardId}, #{memberId}, #{msg})
mapper.select: select msg.msg_id, msg.content, msg.recruit_board_id, msg.time, m.member_id, m.nickname from msg inner join member m on m.member_id=msg.member_id where msg.recruit_board_id=#{recruitBoardId} order by msg.msg_id asc
